questions.question: How many pillars of Islam are there?
questions.explanation: The five pillars of Islam are Shahada, Salah, Zakat, Sawm, and Hajj.

questions.question: Which Surah is known as the 'Heart of the Qur'an'?
questions.explanation: Surah Yaseen is often referred to as the heart of the Qur'an.

questions.question: Who was the first prophet in Islam?
questions.explanation: Adam (AS) was the first human and the first prophet.

questions.question: In which month was the Qur'an first revealed?
questions.explanation: The Qur'an was first revealed in the month of Ramadan on Laylat al-Qadr.

questions.question: What is the name of the angel who brought the revelation to Prophet Muhammad (SAW)?
questions.explanation: Angel Jibril (Gabriel) was responsible for delivering the revelation to the prophets.
